1.title: International Conference "Hot Stars: Life with Circumstellar Matter"
1.text:
Al-Farabi Kazakh National University in Almaty is preparing to host a major international conference "Hot Stars: Life with Circumstellar Matter".

The event will take place from October 14 to 19, 2024, on the campus of Al-Farabi KazNU. Scientists from different countries will discuss the latest achievements in studying the evolution of hot stars and their interaction with the surrounding space. The conference program includes presentations by leading experts and discussions of the latest research, complemented by a diverse cultural program. Participants will have the opportunity to explore Almaty’s landmarks, national cuisine, and the stunning landscapes of the Tien Shan foothills. This conference is being held on this scale for the first time, attracting researchers from the USA and Europe, providing a great opportunity for Kazakhstani astrophysicists and astronomers, especially young specialists, to present on the international stage right in Almaty.

Important Dates:
January 15, 2024 — Early registration opens (registration fee $200/100 — regular/student)
April 16, 2024 — Late registration begins (registration fee $250/150 — regular/student)
August 15, 2024 – Abstract submission deadline
August 20, 2024 - Preliminary scientific program published
October 1, 2024 – Final program published
October 13, 2024 – Opening ceremony (Sunday evening)
October 14, 2024 – Conference begins

Conference website: <link1>https://conf.astrokaznu.kz</link1>, where you can find information about the city, venue, travel and accommodation, and organizing committees.

The conference is registered in the Astronomical Meetings List: <link2>https://www.cadc-ccda.hia-iha.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/en/meetings</link2>
